com.codecool.reviewservice.email

Class Email

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.reviewservice.email.Email

  • public class Email
extends java.lang.Object
    The Email class handles everything related to the applications email-sending features. To be able to use the application properly, you need to create a file (emaildata.properties) in the 'resources' directory, and provide the following data: address=youremail@gmail.com, password=youremailaccountpassword
    Author:
    Kriszta

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBody()
      Returns the text of the message itself; the body attribute of the Email object.
      private java.lang.String getFrom()
      Returns the "FROM" field of the Email object that contains the email address which the email is sent from.
      private java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns the password of email address in the "FROM" field of the Email object
      private java.lang.String getSubject()
      Returns the subject of the email object.
      java.lang.String getTo()
      Returns the "to" field of the Email object that contains the email address which the email is sent to.
      static void newClientEmail(Client client)
      This method builds the body and subject of an Email object, specifically the email sent to the newly registered clients.
      static void ReviewForModerationEmail(Review review)
      This method builds the body and subject of an Email object, specifically the email sent to the client with a newly submitted product review in it.
      private static void sendEmail(Email email)
      This method sets the properties of the SMTP connection (Whis is in this case is gmail smtp connection) and then creates a Message object and sends it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Email

        public Email(java.lang.String to,
             java.lang.String subject,
             java.lang.String body)
        Constructor of the Email class. Needs three parameters to be passed to it. object.
        Parameters:
        to - Email address of the receiver.
        subject - Email address of the sender.
        body - The text of the message.

    • Method Detail

      • getTo

        public java.lang.String getTo()
        Returns the "to" field of the Email object that contains the email address which the email is sent to. Usually the client's email address.
        Returns:
        String The 'to' email address.

      • getFrom

        private java.lang.String getFrom()
        Returns the "FROM" field of the Email object that contains the email address which the email is sent from. Usually the email address of the person, who is running this application.
        Returns:
        String The 'from' email address.

      • getSubject

        private java.lang.String getSubject()
        Returns the subject of the email object.
        Returns:
        String Subject

      • getBody

        public java.lang.String getBody()
        Returns the text of the message itself; the body attribute of the Email object.
        Returns:
        String The text of the email.

      • getPassword

        private java.lang.String getPassword()
        Returns the password of email address in the "FROM" field of the Email object
        Returns:
        String The password of the sender account.

      • newClientEmail

        public static void newClientEmail(Client client)
        This method builds the body and subject of an Email object, specifically the email sent to the newly registered clients. It initializes an Email object passes it to the sendMail() method which sends the email.
        Parameters:
        client - A Client object.
        See Also:
        Client

      • ReviewForModerationEmail

        public static void ReviewForModerationEmail(Review review)
        This method builds the body and subject of an Email object, specifically the email sent to the client with a newly submitted product review in it. It initializes an Email object passes it to the sendMail() method which sends the email.
        Parameters:
        review - A Review object.
        See Also:
        Client

      • sendEmail

        private static void sendEmail(Email email)
        This method sets the properties of the SMTP connection (Whis is in this case is gmail smtp connection) and then creates a Message object and sends it.
        Parameters:
        email - An Email object.
